articles.title: The EU is worried that Israel might extend the war in Gaza to a 'pressure cooker' town near Egypt - The Associated Press
articles.description: The European Union is worried about reports that the Israeli military intends to take its battle against Hamas to the town of Rafah at Gaza’s border with Egypt. Over 1 million Palestinians have escaped the fighting in Rafah. EU foreign policy chief Josep Borr…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The European Union on Saturday expressed deep concern over reports that the Israeli military intends to take its battle against Hamas to the town of Rafah at Gazas border with Egypt whe… [+2470 chars]

articles.title: Measles outbreak: Adults warned of catching 'dangerous' illness as risks are higher in older people - GB News
articles.description: A fresh warning has been shared as cases of measles rise in the UK and across Europe at an "alarming rate".Doctors have warned adults may be more at risk than they realise of the contagious illness. The number of people contracting measles has increased by 20…
